tags.name: simple-datetime
tags.description:
`simple-datetime`

Attributes:

  * `timestamp` {`number`} - Javascript timestamp

  * `date` {`string`} - Date, generated from timestamp + format

  * `format` {`string`} - Format to output, see https://github.com/jacwright/date.format#supported-identifiers

  * `unix` {`boolean`} - Support for UNIX timestamp conversion on the fly

Properties:

  * `timestamp` {`number`} - Javascript timestamp

  * `date` {`string`} - Date, generated from timestamp + format

  * `format` {`string`} - Format to output, see https://github.com/jacwright/date.format#supported-identifiers

  * `unix` {`boolean`} - Support for UNIX timestamp conversion on the fly

attributes.name: date
attributes.description:
`date` {`string`} - Date, generated from timestamp + format

Property: date

attributes.name: format
attributes.description:
`format` {`string`} - Format to output, see https://github.com/jacwright/date.format#supported-identifiers

Property: format

Default: M jS, Y

attributes.name: unix
attributes.description:
`unix` {`boolean`} - Support for UNIX timestamp conversion on the fly

Property: unix

Default: false
